title: Handle a Multiple Offer Situation
description: A listing agent receives multiple offers on a property and must advise the seller on how to proceed.

tasks.description: Receive and organize all submitted offers.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has all offer documents properly filed and accessible.

tasks.description: Create a spreadsheet to summarize and compare the key terms of each offer (price, contingencies, closing date).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a clear, easy-to-understand comparison for the seller.

tasks.description: Advise the seller on negotiation strategies, such as asking all buyers for their 'highest and best' offer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides strategic advice, and a chosen strategy is implemented.
